code: import React from"react";import{Card,CardContent}from"./components/ui/card";import{Badge}from"./components/ui/badge";import{ScrollArea}from"./components/ui/scroll-area";import data from"./tuong.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SinhLuc=_ref=>{let{count}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xl text-red-600",children:"☯︎".repeat(count)});};export default function TuongList(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScrollArea,{className:"h-screen w-full p-6 bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:data.map((tuong,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:tuong.anh,alt:tuong.ten,className:"w-full h-64 object-cover rounded-t-2xl"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{className:"p-4 space-y-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:[tuong.ten," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-gray-500 text-base",children:["(",tuong.tenTQ,")"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["Th\u1EBF l\u1EF1c: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{children:tuong.theLuc})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Sinh l\u1EF1c: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SinhLuc,{count:tuong.sinhLuc})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:tuong.kyNang.map((k,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 border p-2 rounded",children:k.split("\n").map((line,j)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:line},j))},i))})]})]},idx))})});}
